VirtualMedia.longDescription: OEM Extension for VirtualMedia to support Proxy mode.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

WebSocketEndpoint.description: Indicates endpoint socket name and location.
WebSocketEndpoint.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a structure ring indicating location and name of the socket used to communicate with nbd server.
